entry.def: If you skate, you move about wearing ice-skates or roller-skates.

example.ex: I actually skated, and despite some teetering I did not fall on the ice...
example.tran: 我真的滑冰了——尽管有些踉跄，但没有跌跟头。
丹滑着冰来到他的面前。

entry.def: A skate is a kind of flat sea fish.

example.ex: Boats had plenty of mackerel and a few skate.
example.tran: 那些船上有许多鲭鱼，还有几条鳐鱼。

entry.def: If you skate over or round a difficult subject, you avoid discussing it.

example.ex: Scientists have tended to skate over the difficulties of explaining dreams...
example.tran: 科学家们往往回避释梦的难题。

example.ex: When pressed, he skates around the subject of those women who he met as a 19-year-old.
example.tran: 别人逼问他有关他 19 岁时遇到的那些女人的情况时，他就会加以搪塞。
